name: SUPER DISTRO
description: "SUPER DISTRO" is a hard-as-nails 2D platformer in the style of retro games such as Megaman, Super Mario Bros 2: The Lost Levels and other such rage-inducing classics. Taking "Difficult gameplay" to a whole new level - SUPER DISTRO is not for the faint-of-heart. The weak need not apply.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-750 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit: Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K 3.50GHz / AMD FX-9590 4.7GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX760 / AMD R9 280X DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 10 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Flash quality masochistic platformer, pretencious, clunky, plain uninteresting. They artistically made a game about making a difficult game in the form of a game made artificially difficult. Postmodernist thinking loops ya no.  Мазохистичная платформенная аркада браузерного качества, претенциозная, неповоротливая, просто неинтересная. Артистично сделанная игра про создание сложной игры в форме искусственно усложненной игры. Послесовременные мыслительные петли усе такоэ.

So this is what you get if feels like creating a platform game with no creativity whatsoever.   First of all the graphics are quite ugly and I don't mean in a cool retro way, the game is just ugly. The enemies and locations lack originality and don't make any sense at all.  'Super Distro' is a challenging game but that does not make it a good game. The reason why it's so difficult is mainly because of the horrible controls, enemies are often on spots where you can't even shoot them without getting hit.   If that doesn't get you frustrated there's still the terrible music playing on the background which plays in a loop of 6 seconds or something.  The best thing about this game is probably the price (currently 9 cents!) so you can still sell the steam trading cards.
I'm going to need therapy after listening to the music from the first level for 20 minutes.
Fun platformer but controls are terrible. I have to thumb down because it was reason for controls that I stopped playing this game. Just was not worth it. There is nothing more to say.
Cancer.
This is hands down the worst game I have ever played. I'm even ashamed to admit that I played it. Do not buy this the money would be better spent on dog ♥♥♥♥.
Excessively hard for the wrong reasons. The game is frustrating without being rewarding.  Don't buy it except if there's a sale of more than 70% just for the cards
Random buggy full ♥♥♥♥! I hate those guys who made valve to agree refund policy. Now I have to play ♥♥♥♥ like this over 2 hours to get trading cards...
found Out u can wall jump     But stiil lose   11/10 would play crappy 10 cent game with wall jump all over agian
One of the worst 2D platformer Games I have ever played. -10/10

Normally, I like to finish the game reviewing it. However, this game is so hard in all of the wrong reasons, I am going to review it anyway. Difficult games are not fun by themselves. They need to rely on other factors such as good music, graphics, and unique gameplay mechanics to keep the gamer hooked on their game. Super Distro *ahem* sorry, SUPER DISTRO does not have any of these factors.   The first level music is one of the worst songs I’ve ever heard. The graphics are bland. The gameplay is just jumping and shooting enemies hoping you don’t get hit by their bullets. The main character is faceless with one mundane death animation. The game flat out refuses to teach you the controls. And no, this isn’t some kind of learning curve. Some gamers are going to use a keyboard to play their game and they have dozens of keys to try before figuring out the E key is the correct key to fire bullets.   Overall, this game tries way too hard to prove that it is difficult rather than proving than it is a good game. For something that advertises itself as “rage inducing” the only emotion I feel is pity for the developer. They don’t care that their game is good, they care that their game is hard.
WHATEVER YOU DO, DONT BUY THIS!!!!!!! I WANTED TO BUY IT AS A JOKE WHEN IT WAS 9 CENTS BUT OMFG ITS SO BAD. DONT BUY IT AS A JOKE AND SAVE YOUR MONEY.

This game makes me angry due to you will die every min, but i really enjoyed the megaman/ mario feel gameplay. .99 cents is worth the money. IF you want a game sorta like this, look for the game 'Impossible game'. Game is suppose to be hard, takes many tries to actually win the level. All it takes is to learn the patterns of the movements  Pros Mario/megaman feel  achievements trading cards jump on/off walls  Cons Music gets annoying
If you think suicide is the only option, you've clearly never heard of SUPER DISTRO.

After 5,8h i have 1 card, gg   btw. game is crap

No controls explanation, no rebindable keys, no mouse support... the controls are unresponsive... clunky... unforgivable in a platformer.  (YES, you can SHOOT... I found out after dying several times...)
Game good on pegasus maybe not on PC...
A breakthrough in chinese gaming.

Seriously? This game is so bad. You can't even get over the first jump without getting owned by everything. I was half tempted to take a chainsaw to my monitor, then I realized it had cards. Not a total loss: Free game + Cards = Profit, but still torture to idle.
You know those free games you play on newgrounds? yeah well this is like that except worse in every way possible  and to make matters worse you dont even profit from the trading cards

I got this game gifted by a friend. ♥♥♥♥ you Torm

No wonder they gave out free copies. Dont waste your money on this game. Use it on Bad Rats, i hear it's good. They didnt even bother with any instructions. If it weren't for my controller or the reviews I probably would have never guess that you could shoot the obstacles with the 'E' button. And kudos for the guides for free HP refills (press asterisk key on numpad)  The only remotely good thing about this game is it has trading cards and at least has a borderless windowed mode. Honestly they should have changed the character to an image of the 'cover art' so i can watch it repeatedly drop into the black abyss and die.
No real tutorial, bad graphics, bad controls. Not recommended
I got this game gifted by a friend. ♥♥♥♥ you Torm
Great game!

I love hard games, I have played and beaten the most difficult games around from old school stuff like nInja gaiden and battletoads, to new hard games like meat boy and wings of vii. But the one thing that all GOOD hard games have in common is precise, responsive controls.   If a game does not have pinpoint control then it becomes hard for all the wrong reasons and that is the problem with this game. The control in this game is among the worst I have ever seen, your character moves like he is walking through molasses and the jump button is incredibly unresponsive. The first section of the game has some pretty basic platforming, by all standards jumping from platform to platform here should be easy, the platforms are nice and big so there is no real way to over or under shoot your jumps, but due to the horrific controls this section is borderline impossible.  I have no idea if this game has potential or not, what I do know is in its current state it is completely unplayable, avoid this game no matter how cheap it gets(I think I spent 50 cents on it and I feel robbed).

The graphics look like they are placeholders. The controls feel like you are walking on ice. The music is repetitive and annoying. The enemies aren't original and have no AI whatsoever. When you get damaged by something you launch miles away and die.  10/10 Would not get this game for free again.
I thought it can't be that bad.  Oh was I wrong...
